website_summaries.verdict: Another great choice for those who want a lower-impact plyo box, but it may wobble a little on the taller heights.
pros: Made of heavy-duty foam with vinyl fabric to prevent tears
Low impact won't injure your shins
cons: Foam may shift somewhat when used on the taller heights, making it a little unstable

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! I own a small gym so my top priority is to have the proper equipment my clients need but finding those space saving, multi-functional, safe, sturdy and quality pieces. This fits all of those requirements! I love that we can use this one piece of equipment for three different jumping heights, and that it is lightweight and can be quickly & easily changed between the three heights for our fast paced group classes and personal training sessions. We were so impressed with the first one we bought, that we purchased another one right away a day later! Highly recommended for both personal and professional use!!
customer_reviews.author: danielle Halverson

customer_reviews.title: and it feels like there are 3 foam pieces inside
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'2" and 110#...the box was stable enough for me to use maybe twice a month for Crossfit WODs. There are no details regarding the maximum weight allowed for this foam box. Here it is one year later, the covering is buckled, loose, and it feels like there are 3 foam pieces inside, they are shifting- no longer stable. Would like to return it but there is no info regarding that either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs Stability Improvement
customer_reviews.text: 20" level is the only true-safe height. The other two options have the ability to shift immediately on impact. It has happened to two clients as well as myself. Luckily for us we were able to all catch ourselves before seriously getting injured. But other than that it's a good option for a home gym or small studio.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not just a plyobox
customer_reviews.text: These are great but we do not use them as a plyo box, we use them for seating next to a pickleball court. So people can sit but if a player runs into it, nobody gets hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: 6'1 240. Definitely unstable for a guy my size jumping on it. Went with the wood / cushion covered model. It's built like a tank.
customer_reviews.author: vlade86

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Highly reccomend
customer_reviews.text: I actually jumped up on it without the fear of ripping off my shins. Exactly as described. Love it. Highly reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: D. Supanich

customer_reviews.title: Great plyo equipment
customer_reviews.text: For the price and the quality this is perfect plyo box. I bought it for my son to learn box jumps, and it delivers. He feels comfortable jumping withou fear of bashing his shins.
customer_reviews.author: DSD

customer_reviews.title: I Own a gym & our members were tired of ...
customer_reviews.text: I Own a gym & our members were tired of hitting their shins on our traditional plyo boxes. This not only keeps them from injury but it also keeps them from the fear of jumping. I plan to purchase more!
customer_reviews.author: brody

customer_reviews.title: good weight and firm edges
customer_reviews.text: good weight and firm edges. Seem to tip over a lot easier than expected. I have to land in the exact middle or they tip.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Happy camper
customer_reviews.text: I use it pretty much daily. Very sturdy and I love that I won't hurt my shins. The price is fantastic too. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marisol

customer_reviews.title: Cool for like a week or two
customer_reviews.text: Blocks are stacked inside covering and adhesive keeping them together wears down with use and becomes dangerous and unstable. Was cool while it lasted
customer_reviews.author: James Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: After a year owning it and using it once a week the glue that held the sheets of foam together came apart, wasn’t able it use it after that.
customer_reviews.author: charlon quintos

customer_reviews.title: Good support while staying soft in case of any slips
customer_reviews.text: Good support while staying soft in case of any slips. You can rotate the box for 3 different heights for a variety of workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this foam box. I purchased this for a mobile fitness business to train other women. I like that it is firm and stable when you land on it but padded to prevent bruises if you miss. This makes the psychological barrier of jumping and missing less severe. So far it compares well to the soft box at my gym.
customer_reviews.author: MK V

customer_reviews.title: works great. its pretty light so you need to put ...
customer_reviews.text: just what I expected. works great. its pretty light so you need to put it against something.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product - happy to have been able to get it in Dubai from US ! Usually almost no products are shipped here ! Only downside is that it’s a bit unstable and has to be set against a wall for max security. So making it a bit heavier would do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Fabre

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice box but a bit light so easy to knock over. Great having one at the gym
customer_reviews.author: x94kenyon

customer_reviews.title: Good box, great price.
customer_reviews.text: The cover seems to be of decent quality. The box itself is good sized and there is plenty of landing room. Best price by far that I found on a soft plyo box with these dimensions. It handles my 215lbs just fine. Seems like it will last in a home setting for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Actually purchased this as an alternative to more expensive "bales" ...
customer_reviews.text: Actually purchased this as an alternative to more expensive "bales" to stand on to do chiropractic adjustments on horses. So far it is serving its purpose. We'll see how it holds up in the long run. Just wish it had handles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I was worried that it would not be very sturdy, but it is great.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Love this for box jumps so I won't cut my ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this for box jumps so I won't cut my legs up. However, it loses stability as you adjust for a higher jump. I simply keep it at the lowest height and still get a great workout.
customer_reviews.author: Review Extraordinaire

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home gym
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. The box is only 11 pounds so it's easy to move from inside to outside. I workout in my basement and the ceilings are too low to do box jumps.
customer_reviews.author: Colt

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this because I bit it hard during a box jump and couldn't get past the mental block to jump on a wooden box again. Not as stable on the 36 height but works for me as all I need for now is 20 and 24.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: No more shin injuries! love this Plyo box!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Very durable and I don't have to worry about getting my skins skinned up! Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Misti N. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Not safe for jumping!
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase for plyometrics/jumping. Its so light that its incredibly unstable at any of the 3 heights. However, it is well made and seems sturdy, so if your purpose is something less dynamic it might be just fine for you.
customer_reviews.author: saiyan_trainer

customer_reviews.title: Too light
customer_reviews.text: This box is too light for my place. I'm always a nervous wreck that someone will flip this box over too easy. If you are using because you have aced box jumps then it's great, not stable enough for beginners or increasing your height.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Marie

product_meta.title: Sunny Health & Fitness No. 072 3-in-1 Foam Plyo Jumping Box
product_meta.description: The Sunny Health and Fitness No.072 3-in-1 Foam Fitness Pylo Box is an excellent fitness tool for box jumps, box push-ups, dips, step-ups and planks. The versatile, sturdy box is an essential component to any workout routine. Made from thick, dense foam, the Sunny Pylo Box will support your body through vigorous workouts. The exercise box rotates for three different elevation levels up to 28” inches forcing you to jump higher and burn more calories. A vinyl coating offers a soft surface that won’t scrape or chafe your skin. Weighing in at 11 lbs, this hefty block is here to help you strengthen and build endurance. Dimension 28L x 24W x 20H inches.
feature_bullets: MATERIAL: Ultra Dense Foam enclosed with heavy duty PVC fabric for durability. The vinyl coating keeps the box tear-resistant and sturdy as you perform continuous jumps and exercise routines.

ADJUSTABLE SIZE: Rotate the box for more challenging heights. Instead of buying three separate boxes, this jumping box gives a variety of size choices for a versatile workout. Can be easily adjusted to three different heights: 28", 24", and 20" inches.

SLIP-RESISTANT SURFACE: The box provides a surface your feet can easily grip to help you avoid slipping. Foam construction helps prevent shin injury. The premium dense foam is designed with comfort and flexibility in mind to protect your body.

GREAT EXERCISE TOO: Targets shoulders, Arms, chest, ABS, glutes and legs; strengthens and improves overall core stability. Versatile capabilities allow for various full body exercises; cross fit friendly.
PORTABLE: The lightweight design weighs 11lbs, which makes the plyo box easy to move. The jump box can support up to 550lbs.
